headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Eyes AI, Data-Center Expansion as Rosenblatt Stays Neutral
summary: Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET) is one of the 15 best AI stocks to watch in December 2025. On December 7, 2025, Rosenblatt Securities’ Michael Genovese reiterated a “Hold” rating on Arista Networks Inc. (NYSE:ANET) with a $140 price target. In the lead-up to this update, Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET) has presented a strong growth narrative, […]

headline: Arista Scales Up Campus Wireless With VESPA Tech: Stock to Aid?
summary: ANET unveils VESPA to boost campus Wi-Fi with seamless roaming, massive scale support, and upgraded AI-driven AVA for smarter network operations.

headline: What Arista Networks (ANET)'s Expanded AI‑Driven Campus and Industrial Networking Push Means For Shareholders
summary: Arista Networks recently announced major upgrades for its Cognitive Campus offering, including VESPA for large-scale WLAN mobility, expanded AVA agentic AI capabilities for AI Ops, and new ruggedized EOS-based switches for harsh outdoor and industrial environments, with general availability expected by the first quarter of 2026. By extending its cloud‑style, software-driven networking and AI automation into massive Wi‑Fi roaming domains and industrial edge sites, Arista is pushing its...
